text: OneSync is a free and open-source sync tool developed by CodeDroids team. It maximizes lightweight synchronization experience and provides both offline synchronization through thumb drive and online synchronization through Dropbox. ==See also== * Comparison of file hosting services * Comparison of file synchronization software * Comparison of online backup services ==References== ==External links== * The official web site Category:Data synchronization Category:Free software programmed in C Sharp
title: OneSync
